\part*{Approval Sheet}

In partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering, and Bachelor of Science in Electronics and Communications Engineering, this project
entitled ``Effect of Net Metering and Rooftop Photovoltaics on Electricity Theft Detection'', prepared and submitted by Carl Samuel R. Lavilla, Michael E. Osorio, and Zildjian Joshua C. Restituto, is hereby recommended for approval.
